scripts.start:docker: npm run openapi:multi && ng serve --configuration docker --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4100
scripts.watch: npm run openapi:multi && ng build --watch --configuration development
scripts.openapi:clean: rimraf src/app/api/generated && rimraf .openapi.*.hash && rimraf openapi-*.json && rimraf openapi.json && rimraf .openapi.hash
scripts.openapi:refresh: npm run openapi:clean && npm run openapi:multi
scripts.openapi:ensure: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'src/app/api/generated/invoice/index.ts'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { console.log('OpenAPI clients already present'); } else { console.log('Generating OpenAPI clients...'); process.exit(1); }" || npm run openapi:multi
scripts.postinstall: npm run openapi:ensure || echo Postinstall completed
